channel.title: Beauty for Ashes women's devotionals
channel.description:
Ladies, this free, weekly email devotional will encourage you with insights from the Bible especially for women. Let "Beauty for Ashes" help you discover the treasure that God sees in you!
"...to bestow on them a crown of beauty instead of ashes, the oil of gladness instead of mourning, and a garment of praise instead of a spirit of despair." (Isaiah 61:3)
If you would rather receive this weekly devotional via email, simply go to www.lifepointcc.org/ladiesnewsletter.asp and sign up. It only takes a minute and is free!

item.title: Beauty for Ashes - October 23, 2006
item.description:
Beauty for Ashes - Weekly encouragement for women.

If you would rather receive this weekly devotional via email, simply go to www.lifepointcc.org/ladiesnewsletter.asp and sign up. It only takes a minute and it's free!

(Visit us online at www.lifepointcc.org)

item.title: Beauty for Ashes - Special Prayer Request
item.description:
A special message and request for prayer...

Marie Ploof, who writes these women's devotionals, began having seizures last week and is not able to send a devotional today. She has undergone tests, but the doctors still cannot determine the cause. Please think of her this week and lift her up before the Lord in prayer. We hope she will be back to full health very soon.

Thank you, and God bless you!

Phil Pike
LifePoint Community Church
